tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VolunteerAttendance (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  volunteer_id INT,
  attendance_date DATE,
  hours_spent FLOAT,
  is_present BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
    attendance_status VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_event
        FOREIGN KEY (event_id)
        REFERENCES Events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT REFERENCES Events(event_id),
    volunteer_id INT REFERENCES Volunteers(volunteer_id),
    attendance_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE event_attendance (
    event_id INT,
    volunteer_id INT,
    attendance_status VARCHAR(10),
    PRIMARY KEY (event_id, volunteer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES volunteer_events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (volunteer_id) REFERENCES volunteers(volunteer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_feedback (
    event_id INT,
    volunteer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (event_id, volunteer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES volunteer_events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (volunteer_id) REFERENCES volunteers(volunteer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Attendance (
  attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  volunteer_id INT,
  event_id INT,
  attendance_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (volunteer_id) REFERENCES Volunteers(volunteer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE VolunteerActivities (
  volunteer_id INT,
  activity_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (volunteer_id, activity_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (volunteer_id) REFERENCES Volunteers(volunteer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES Activities(activity_id)
);
